text: Szarocin () is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Kamienna Góra, within Kamienna Góra County, Lower Silesian Voivodeship, in south- western Poland. Prior to 1945 it was in Germany. It lies approximately south- west of Kamienna Góra, and south-west of the regional capital Wrocław. == Gallery == File:Szarocin (001).jpg|Cross roads File:Szarocin (006).jpg|Shop File:Szarocin stone cross 2016 P01.jpg|Wayside cross ==References== Szarocin
